short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Coriander to recipes on Taste.com.au

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a step to the method of every recipe on Taste.com.au instructing you to add a large amount of Coriander.

Why would you want to do this? Well, it depends if you know anyone that finds the taste of coriander / cilantro to be soapy and disgusting.
